{'userid': '12345'}.response: The rich menu ID for user with userid '12345' has been successfully retrieved. The user currently has the rich menu with ID 'richmenu-abcdef1234567890' assigned to their account. With this ID, you can further manage user-specific rich menus, like updating the content, changing the layout, or potentially unsetting the menu if needed. Note that rich menus are a powerful feature in LINE Messaging API as they provide a more interactive and engaging way to communicate with the users by offering multiple pre-defined actions available at the tap of a button. You can customize these menus extensively based on your application's needs and the user's preferences.
